title: LISTEN: The Debate - Jan 24: Andy Townsend, Adrian Bevington, Jane Dougall
description: Andy Townsend, Adrian Bevington, and Jane Dougall joined Geoff Shreeves on The Debate to discuss all the big talking points.
content: Former FA chief executive Bevington and Sky Sports News reporter Dougall offered the latest of the controversy surrounding Phil Neville's appointment as England Women's manager.Attention then turned to the night's Carabao Cup action as Arsenal came from behind to beat Chelsea to set up a final with Manchester City at Wembley.The draw for the UEFA Nations League was next under the spotlight before the panel answered YOUR questions in a Twitter Q&A to end the show.All that and more in the latest The Debate podcast.Listen to The Debate and subscribe to more podcasts via iTunes
